issue.title: "User perimeter" should be an option
issue.body:
**Original author :** Blatti Yves

The feature in shop "User perimeter" or "my perimeter" should be a platform option.
If a platform doesn't use this feature (users don't have a perimeter), the selection of "my perimeter" in a diffusion is problematic.

We should introduce a SHOP option to disable this feature, which will drive:
- the visibility of the perimeter list offered in screen (hide "my perimeter")
- the "restrict to user perimeter" choice

**Fixed versions :** 4.3.1
